prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What are Stefan's true and genuine thoughts, feelings, and intentions towards me?

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a structured listing of all relevant chart data based on horary principles for your query:

• Planetary Positions:
 – Sun at 29°58′ Aquarius (located in the 2nd House, starting at 9° Aquarius)
 – Moon at 4°29′ Scorpio (located in the 10th House, starting at 28° Libra as given)
 – Mercury at 7°10′ Pisces (in the 2nd House)
 – Venus at 8°18′ Aries (in the 3rd House, since 3rd spans 25° Pisces to 28° Aries)
 – Mars at 17°13′ Cancer (retrograde; in the 7th House, which begins at 3° Cancer)
 – Jupiter at 11°36′ Gemini (in the 6th House, starting at 9° Gemini)
 – Saturn at 19°24′ Pisces (in the 2nd House)
 – Uranus at 23°24′ Taurus (in the 5th House, starting at 20° Taurus)
 – Neptune at 28°31′ Pisces (in the 3rd House; Pisces spans from 25° Pisces here)
 – Pluto at 2°35′ Aquarius (in the 1st House, beginning at 3° Capricorn, given that Pluto is contained there as noted)
 – North Node at 28°56′ Pisces (retrograde; in the 3rd House)
 – Chiron at 20°07′ Aries (in the 3rd House)
 – Ascendant at 3°05′ Capricorn (1st House cusp)
 – Midheaven (MC) at 28°43′ Libra (10th House cusp)
 – Immum Coeli (IC) at 28°43′ Aries (4th House cusp)

• Major Aspects (with noted orbs):
 – MC Opposition IC        (or 0° orb)
 – Neptune Conjunction North Node  (or 0° orb)
 – Moon Sextile Ascendant      (or 1° orb)
 – Sun Sextile IC           (or 1° orb)
 – Sun Trine MC            (or 1° orb)
 – Moon Square Pluto          (or 2° orb)
 – Mars Trine Saturn          (or 2° orb)
 – Venus Sextile Jupiter         (or 3° orb)
 – Mars Square Chiron          (or 3° orb)
 – Moon Trine Mercury          (or 3° orb)
 – Pluto Sextile North Node      (or 4° orb)
 – Saturn Sextile Uranus         (or 4° orb)
 – Mercury Sextile Ascendant      (or 4° orb)
 – Sun Sextile Ascendant         (or 4° orb)
 – Pluto Square IC            (or 4° orb)
 – Pluto Square MC            (or 4° orb)
 – Mercury Square Jupiter         (or 4° orb)
 – Ascendant Sextile MC          (or 5° orb)
 – Uranus Sextile Neptune         (or 5° orb)
 – Neptune Square Ascendant        (or 5° orb)
 – Venus Square Ascendant         (or 5° orb)
 – Ascendant Trine IC            (or 5° orb)
 – Sun Trine Moon               (or 5° orb)
 – Mars Sextile Uranus           (or 6° orb)
 – Venus Sextile Pluto           (or 6° orb)
 – Sun Square Uranus            (or 6° orb)
 – Moon Opposition IC           (or 6° orb)
 – Moon Conjunction MC           (or 6° orb)
 – Chiron Opposition MC           (or 8° orb)
 – Chiron Conjunction IC          (or 8° orb)

• Configurational Patterns Identified:
 – T-Square Pattern: Involving the MC (28° Libra), Pluto (2° Aquarius), and IC (28° Aries) with the Moon (4° Scorpio) as the tense/intervening point.
 – Cradle Pattern: Formed by the Moon (4° Scorpio), IC (28° Aries), Sun (29° Aquarius), Ascendant (3° Capricorn), and MC (28° Libra).

• Special Chart Features:
 – The Moon is a waning gibbous.
 – The chart displays a bucket shape.
 – Dominance of the Cardinal mode among inner planets.
 – A concentration of most inner planets in the bottom hemisphere.
 – Mars is descending within the 7th House.
 – Moon is positioned on the Midheaven, with Chiron and the IC on the Nadir.
 – Sextile aspects are the most frequent, totaling 11 occurrences.
 – The Sun is involved in 10 aspects.
 – Neptune in Pisces is positioned within its own rulership.

• House Placements Summary:
 – 1st House (3° Capricorn): Contains Pluto.
 – 2nd House (starting at 9° Aquarius): Contains Sun, Mercury, and Saturn.
 – 3rd House (starting at 25° Pisces): Contains Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron.
 – 4th House (starting at 28° Aries): No additional planets noted.
 – 5th House (starting at 20° Taurus): Contains Uranus.
 – 6th House (starting at 9° Gemini): Contains Jupiter.
 – 7th House (starting at 3° Cancer): Contains Mars.
 – 8th House (starting at 9° Leo): No additional planets noted.
 – 9th House (starting at 25° Virgo): No additional planets noted.
 – 10th House (starting at 28° Libra): Contains Moon.
 – 11th House (starting at 20° Scorpio): No additional planets noted.
 – 12th House (starting at 9° Sagittarius): No additional planets noted.

All data points are collated strictly from the provided horary chart.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is my interpretation based strictly on the horary data provided:

• Stefan’s potential as signified in the chart is largely represented by Mars in the 7th House (Cancer, retrograde). This placement indicates that his approach to the relationship is emotionally charged but complicated by a hesitancy or internal conflict. The retrograde motion and the square with Chiron (3° orb) point to a wound—a sense of vulnerability or past hurt—that colors his intentions. He may feel both drawn to and cautious about opening up completely.

• The Moon in Scorpio (positioned in the 10th House, on the Midheaven) suggests that his underlying emotional currents run deep and are intense. Although his emotions are powerful, the Moon’s square to Pluto (2° orb) reveals inner turmoil; he struggles with processing transformative, perhaps even disruptive, feelings. Such tension may be causing him to conceal aspects of his true thoughts or to oscillate between passion and defensive reserve.

• The harmonious Moon sextile Ascendant (1° orb) and Mercury sextile Ascendant (4° orb) indicate that beneath his complicated emotional layer there is a desire for clear and sincere communication. He likely hopes to express his thoughts and feelings in a manner that connects personally, though his inner conflicts might not always allow full clarity.

• The Sun in Aquarius (in the 2nd House) forming aspects such as sextiles to both the IC (1° orb) and the Ascendant (4° orb) contributes a rational overlay. This suggests that, despite his deeply felt emotions, there is an effort to maintain some detachment and objectivity. He may be wrestling with an intellectual assessment of the situation, weighing material or practical concerns alongside his affective responses.

• The T-Square formed by Pluto in Aquarius (1st House) opposing the IC in Aries and set off by the Moon in Scorpio points to a high-tension dynamic. Pluto’s presence here forces transformation on emotional patterns and relationship dynamics—implying that Stefan’s inner world is tumultuous. This tension can result in fluctuating intentions, where periods of intense focus may be followed by rapid retreat or recalibration in his approach.

• Neptune’s placement in Pisces (within its own rulership) conjoining the North Node emphasizes an idealistic, even escapist, quality. Stefan’s thoughts and intentions may carry an overlay of fantasy or projection. In some respects, he might see the relationship in an idealized light or harbor expectations that are more about a dream than a fully grounded reality. The Neptune influence warns that his genuine feelings are filtered through an aura of idealism, making it challenging for him to fully confront the practical aspects of his intentions.

• Additional supportive aspects, such as Mars trine Saturn (2° orb), suggest that despite the emotional turbulence, there is a stabilizing desire to structure his actions. He is likely torn between a disciplined approach and an impulsive drive; this dichotomy further complicates the clarity of his intentions.

• The overall emphasis on cardinal signs and the bucket shape of the chart, with most inner planets concentrated in the lower hemisphere, reinforces a theme of active internal reorganization. Stefan’s internal state is charged with transformation, meaning that his true thoughts and feelings are in a state of flux.

In summary:
 – Stefan’s genuine thoughts and feelings are marked by deep emotional undercurrents and a strong idealistic overlay, tempered by unresolved internal wounds.
 – His intentions toward you are conflicted—he is drawn by both passion and a desire for emotional connection but remains cautious, partly due to lingering vulnerability.
 – The presence of intense transformative aspects indicates that while he may appear ambiguous in his outward actions, internally he is undergoing a process of re-evaluation and restructuring in how he approaches the relationship.

These observations derive directly from the horary chart’s placements and aspect patterns, providing a layered yet data-driven account of Stefan’s internal dynamics regarding his thoughts, feelings, and intentions toward you.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Reviewing the marriage indicators for Stefan using horary principles, note the following:

• The 7th House begins at 3° Cancer. Its traditional ruler, the Moon, is positioned in Scorpio and located on the Midheaven. In horary queries regarding marriage, the Moon typically represents a committed union.

• The Moon’s placement on the MC along with its involvement in a T-square—with Pluto (2° Aquarius in the 1st House) and the IC (28° Aries)—indicates an established connection that is publicly recognized but is fraught with internal tension.

• Mars in the 7th House (Cancer) further represents his active role in relationships. Its retrograde motion and challenging aspect (square) to Chiron suggest unresolved wounds that may be affecting his ability to maintain a harmonious union.

• Additional aspects (e.g., Moon square Pluto) reinforce themes of deep emotional conflict and transformative stress, a pattern not uncommon in unions that are in crisis or undergoing significant change.

Based strictly on the horary factors, Stefan’s chart indicates that he is indeed in a marital relationship. However, the union is marked by considerable internal discord and tension, implying that while a marital bond exists, it is currently destabilized and subject to disruptive forces.
swipes:
Reviewing the marriage indicators for Stefan using horary principles, note the following:

• The 7th House begins at 3° Cancer. Its traditional ruler, the Moon, is positioned in Scorpio and located on the Midheaven. In horary queries regarding marriage, the Moon typically represents a committed union.

• The Moon’s placement on the MC along with its involvement in a T-square—with Pluto (2° Aquarius in the 1st House) and the IC (28° Aries)—indicates an established connection that is publicly recognized but is fraught with internal tension.

• Mars in the 7th House (Cancer) further represents his active role in relationships. Its retrograde motion and challenging aspect (square) to Chiron suggest unresolved wounds that may be affecting his ability to maintain a harmonious union.

• Additional aspects (e.g., Moon square Pluto) reinforce themes of deep emotional conflict and transformative stress, a pattern not uncommon in unions that are in crisis or undergoing significant change.

Based strictly on the horary factors, Stefan’s chart indicates that he is indeed in a marital relationship. However, the union is marked by considerable internal discord and tension, implying that while a marital bond exists, it is currently destabilized and subject to disruptive forces.
